text: Crooklyn is a 1994 semi-autobiographic drama movie. It was directed by Spike Lee. He also wrote the movie and acted in it. The movie takes place in the 1970s in Brooklyn, New York. The stars Alfre Woodard, Delroy Lindo, David Patrick Kelly, and Zelda Harris. Crooklyn was released in May 1994 and did well at the box office. Category:1994 drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:American drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Spike Lee
title: Crooklyn
